title: First Ride: The Canyon and DT Swiss F 132 One Gravel Fork Is US Forbidden Fruit
content:
Canyon and DT Swiss' new suspension fork is forbidden fruit in the US. Here's what it was like to ride in the Traka.

Read the full article at First Ride: The Canyon and DT Swiss F 132 One Gravel Fork Is US Forbidden Fruit on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
